The in-your-face attitude and snappy dialogue of E4 show
&#039;Skins&#039; has made it a cult classic, but what really sticks
in our minds is the soundtrack. The use of Gossip&#039;s
&#039;Standing In The Way Of Control&#039; and Bloc Party&#039;s
&#039;Positive Tension&#039; has won us over at 4Music and now you
can own all the top tracks from the show on one handy CD.

But wait is there a great bonus track you can only get on
this album? Yes it&#039;s &#039;Wild World&#039; sung by cast member Mike
Bailey who plays lovelorn Sid, the guy who can&#039;t lose his
virginity. The song is a cover of the classic Cat Stevens
track, which interestingly re-entered the Top 40 earlier
this year on the back of it being sung on the show.
